mapper.delete:
update zx_eq_Equip set del_flag = '1', modify_time=#{param2.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_user=#{param2.modifyUser}, modify_user_name=#{param2.modifyUserName} where del_flag = '0' and id in
#{model.id}
mapper.select:
select
(select department_name from sys_department where department_id=e.ownerOrgID) ownerOrgName,
e.abcType,
e.equipName,
e.model,
e.spec,
e.power,
e.orginalValue as orginalValue,
e.leftValue as leftValue,
e.factory,
case when e.source=1 then '自购' when e.source=2 then '租赁' when e.source=3 then '协作队伍自带' end as source,
DATE_FORMAT(e.acceptanceDate,'%Y-%m-%d') as acceptanceDateStr,
DATE_FORMAT(e.outFactoryDate,'%Y-%m-%d') as outFactoryDateStr,
e.outFactorySerial,
e.mainFactory,
e.mainspec,
e.mainpowerStr,
e.mainserial,
DATE_FORMAT(e.mainoutfactory,'%Y-%m-%d') as mainoutfactoryStr,
e.viceFactory,
e.vicespec,
e.vicepowerStr,
DATE_FORMAT(e.viceoutfactory,'%Y-%m-%d') as viceoutfactoryStr,
e.downfactory,
e.downspec,
e.downserial,
DATE_FORMAT(e.viceoutfactory,'%Y-%m-%d') as downoutfactoryStr,
e.heightlong,
e.weight,
(select department_name from sys_department where department_id=e.useOrgID) useOrgID,
e.isMadeinChina,
e.equipNo,
e.financeNo,
e.passNo,
e.remark from zx_eq_Equip as e left join sys_department o on o.department_ID = e.ownerOrgID where ifnull(e.resCatalogID,'') like ('%' || #{resCatalogID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%') and ifnull(e.equipName,'') like ('%' || #{equipName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%') and ifnull(e.usePlace,'') like ('%' || #{usePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%') and (e.acceptanceDate is null or e.acceptanceDate <= #{acceptanceDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ) and e.orginalValue <= #{orginalValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and ifnull(e.isMadeinChina,'') like ('%' || #{isMadeinChina,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%') and ifnull(e.status,'') not in ('报废','转让外部单位') and (e.useOrgID=#{useOrgID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or #{useOrgID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}='' or #{useOrgID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} is null) and e.abcType like '%'||#{abcType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' and e.equipName in ('大客车','小轿车','吉普车','旅行车','载重汽车') order by o.sort,ltrim(e.equipNo)

select
(select department_name from sys_department where department_id=e.ownerOrgID) ownerOrgName,
e.abcType,
e.equipName,
e.model,
e.spec,
e.power,
e.orginalValue as orginalValue,
e.leftValue as leftValue,
e.factory,
case when e.source=1 then '自购' when e.source=2 then '租赁' when e.source=3 then '协作队伍自带' end as source,
DATE_FORMAT(e.acceptanceDate,'%Y-%m-%d') as acceptanceDateStr,
DATE_FORMAT(e.outFactoryDate,'%Y-%m-%d') as outFactoryDateStr,
e.outFactorySerial,
e.mainFactory,
e.mainspec,
e.mainpowerStr,
e.mainserial,
DATE_FORMAT(e.mainoutfactory,'%Y-%m-%d') as mainoutfactoryStr,
e.viceFactory,
e.vicespec,
e.vicepowerStr,
DATE_FORMAT(e.viceoutfactory,'%Y-%m-%d') as viceoutfactoryStr,
e.downfactory,
e.downspec,
e.downserial,
DATE_FORMAT(e.viceoutfactory,'%Y-%m-%d') as downoutfactoryStr,
e.heightlong,
e.weight,
(select department_name from sys_department where department_id=e.useOrgID) useOrgID,
e.isMadeinChina,
e.equipNo,
e.financeNo,
e.passNo,
e.remark from zx_eq_Equip as e left join sys_department o on o.department_ID = e.ownerOrgID where ifnull(e.resCatalogID,'') like ('%' || #{resCatalogID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%') and ifnull(e.equipName,'') like ('%' || #{equipName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%') and ifnull(e.usePlace,'') like ('%' || #{usePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%') and (e.acceptanceDate is null or e.acceptanceDate <= #{acceptanceDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ) and e.orginalValue <= #{orginalValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and ifnull(e.isMadeinChina,'') like ('%' || #{isMadeinChina,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%') and ifnull(e.status,'') not in ('报废','转让外部单位') and (e.useOrgID=#{useOrgID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or #{useOrgID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}='' or #{useOrgID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} is null) and e.abcType like '%'||#{abcType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' and e.equipName not in ('大客车','小轿车','吉普车','旅行车','载重汽车') order by o.sort,ltrim(e.equipNo)

select (select o.department_name from sys_department o where o.department_ID = ie.ownerOrgID) as ownerOrgName, (select o.project_name from sys_project o where o.project_id = ie.useOrgID) as useOrgName,ie.manageOrgID, ie.equipNo,ie.equipName,ie.model,ie.spec,ie.factory,DATE_FORMAT(ie.outFactoryDate,'%Y%m%d') as outFactoryDate, DATE_FORMAT(ie.acceptanceDate,'%Y%m%d') as acceptanceDate, ie.orginalValue,ie.leftValue, ie.passNo, ie.remark from zx_eq_equip ie inner join sys_project sp on sp.project_id = ie.ownerOrgID and (sp.project_id = #{orgID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or sp.company_id = #{orgID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) where ie.purDate between #{beginDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ie.equipNo like '%'|| #{equipNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' and ie.equipName like '%'||#{equipName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' and ie.useOrgID like '%'||#{useOrgID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' and ie.resCatalogID = (select ID from zx_eq_rescategory_materials where catName = '运输机械')
